testproblem.name: 2D_Henry_Saline_Intrusion
testproblem.tags: porous mpml adaptivity transport solute saline intrusion

pass_tests.test:
check_test = False with open("log", "rb") as f: linelist = f.readlines() # Read the first line. last = linelist[len(linelist)-1] # The last line f.close
if 'OK' in last: check_test = True
assert(check_test)
